mapper.select: select a.post_title,b.mb_name,a.post_date,a.post_con,c.pbigc_name,d.psmallc_name,a.post_price,b.mb_name,e.rp_date,e.rp_content from post a, member b , pbigc c , psmallc d , report e where a.mb_num_pk = b.mb_num_pk and a.psmallc_pk = d.psmallc_pk and d.pbigc_pk = c.pbigc_pk and e.rp_mbn = b.mb_num_pk AND a.post_num_pk = #{post_num_pk}
